00028 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00029 /// CTreeTracerSelector
00030 ///
00031 /// @description  This class is the encapsulation of all the tracers as well as
00032 ///               the user interface to select them and the parameters. It has a
00033 ///               ComboBox that lists all tracers it knows about and two
00034 ///               spinboxes that allow user manipulation of the Depth and
00035 ///               QSDepth. When any of the parameters are changed it emits the
00036 ///               activated() signal.
00037 ///
00038 /// @limitations
00039 ///
00040 ////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////////
00041 class CTreeTracerSelector : public QObject
00042 {
00043     Q_OBJECT
00044 
00045 public:
00046     CTreeTracerSelector( QObject *parent );
00047     ~CTreeTracerSelector();
00048     QMenu * getAIConfigMenu();
00049     QToolButton * getAIConfigButton();
00050     QSpinBox *getDepthSelector();
00051     QSpinBox *getQSDepthSelector();
00052     QLabel *getAILabel();
00053     STreeTrace *trace( const STreeNode *rootNode ) const;
00054 
00055

00057 
00058     void toggleID();
00059     void toggleDL();
00060     void toggleAB();
00061     void toggleHT();
00062     void toggleQS();

00064     void activate();
00065 
00066 signals:
00067     void activated();
00068

00070     void setupDepthList();

00075     void updateLabel() const;
00076
